name: Brenden's Game Landfill
description:
BGLF features 15 different minigames of varying complexity and completeness. Each minigame contains two or three different unlockable modes to play with. Minigames can also be played in succession for a highscore through one of three Mixes. The minigames are as follows:

  • Manhole Meteors - Guide falling meteors into manholes to defeat the enemy spheres!
  • Rulers - Aim and shoot a ruler at the target!
  • Balls - Shoot balls to flip the panels!
  • Cloud - Rain and snow on a plant to help it grow to the top!
  • Speed Square - Jump and fall through platforms to unlock the exit ship!
  • Grow Grass - Drive around a lawn mower, refuel its gas, and cut all the grass!
  • Fallout 5 - Begin an epic quest loosely based on the Fallout series!
  • Marley - Avoid enemies by moving across multiple lines!
  • Egg 2: Return of Jafar - Defeat Jafar in an ultimate fight to the death!
  • Cheatcodes - Hack into the mainframe by cracking the code!
  • Game Z - Set out on an adventure for the lost treasure!
  • Game Y - Keep jumping and get powerups to stay above the rising lava!
  • Twinbee - Shoot at balloons and merge them together!
  • Unknown - Blast boxes with yellow particles of light!
  • Run - Collect orbs to escape from the poisonous fog!

Every minigame was previously a mini-project I've worked on between 2017 to 2019.
